thread.title: Jim Ross provides update on his wife following accident, thanks fans for support
thread.title_full: Jim Ross provides update on his wife following accident, thanks fans for support

title: Jim Ross provides update on his wife following accident, thanks fans for support
text:
Mar 22, 2017 at 11:28a ET 0Shares 
Legendary pro wrestling voice Jim Ross posted an updated on his blog about his wife‚Äôs Jan‚Äôs condition. 
Jan Ross was in an accident on Monday when a car driven by a 17-year-old hit her while she was driving her Vespa. 
Jan Ross had surgery following the accident and is currently in a coma. 
Per JR: 
Monday night at approximately 9:30 pm while I was recording the Ross Report about 30 miles from our home, my wife Jan was riding her Vespa home from the gym when when was struck from behind by an automobile driven by a 17 year old young man. Jan suffered a catastrophic brain injury including multiple skull fractures. My little Angel was unfortunately not wearing a helmet which arguably would have prevented the extreme nature of her injuries. 
I will fully admit that there has been no experience in my life that could have prepared me for this life changing week. To see one‚Äôs life partner and love of one‚Äôs life being kept alive via life support equipment is tragically heartbreaking. We'll never be able to thank everyone for all your prayers for my wife Jan who's still in critical condition in OU Medical Center. üôèüôè 
‚Äî Jim Ross (@JRsBBQ) March 22, 2017 
Mick Foley and The Big Show were among those sending prayers to the Ross family. I'm praying for that miracle @JRsBBQ . I am so very sorry. https://t.co/fy4tbi6RNI 
‚Äî Mick Foley (@RealMickFoley) March 22, 2017 
Thoughts and prayers to Jim and Jan Ross from everyone at FOX Sports. 0
